definition: to become tainted with the smell of sth else/to pick up an odor

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: If placed in the refrigerator will be Chuanwei.
No smell pollution exists among the independent chambers.
sentences.chinese: 各獨立箱倉之間互不串味。

definition: to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
(milk) to turn sour/(meat, fish) to go off
refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
(of clothing, furniture, walls etc) to get damp (by absorbing moisture from the air or the ground)
